about_the_game:
In the vicinity of the city of Chertoril, strange things began to happen: residents began to turn into terrible zombies. To stop the spread of the infection and find out the causes of this phenomenon, a special detachment "S.P.E.C." was created. The main character will have to face the horrors that reign in the city. She needs to find resources and uncover all the secrets of the corporations involved in terrible experiments.

The game is filled with puzzles and riddles that need to be solved in order to progress further. Many doors are locked, so the heroine will have to look for keys and various items related to quests.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: some scenes may be disturbing for the player.

detailed_description:
In the vicinity of the city of Chertoril, strange things began to happen: residents began to turn into terrible zombies. To stop the spread of the infection and find out the causes of this phenomenon, a special detachment "S.P.E.C." was created. The main character will have to face the horrors that reign in the city. She needs to find resources and uncover all the secrets of the corporations involved in terrible experiments.

The game is filled with puzzles and riddles that need to be solved in order to progress further. Many doors are locked, so the heroine will have to look for keys and various items related to quests.
name: РЕZИК

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D 9 compatible or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D 9 compatible or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: In the vicinity of the city of Chertoril, strange things began to happen: residents began to turn into terrible zombies.
